Logic Analysis: Contains ComplianceAPI class with methods for document upload, data validation, publishing data, and generating evidence packs.
Defines Document, EvidencePack, and ComplianceRun classes.
Contains Pydantic models for data validation.
Utility functions for handling file operations and data processing.
Main entry point for the frontend application.
Manages evidence pack generation and display.
Full API spec:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Compliance API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /upload:
    post:
      summary: Upload a document
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                document:
                  type: string
                  format: binary
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Document uploaded successfully
  /validate:
    post:
      summary: Validate data
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Validation result
  /publish:
    post:
      summary: Publish data
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Data published successfully
  /generate_evidence_pack/{run_id}:
    get:
      summary: Generate evidence pack
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: run_id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Evidence pack generated successfully
Shared Knowledge: `workspace/clearcare_compliance/app/utils.py` contains utility functions shared across the project.
Anything UNCLEAR: Clarification needed on specific compliance regulations to ensure the product meets all necessary requirements.
